title: What type of images do children keep in their phones? - Quora

response.answer_text: It entirely depends. From my experiences, both personal experiences and from seeing friends galleries, it can include everything from pictures of significant others, to memes, or even the parents least favorite, nudes. It really depends on the person, though.

I keep a lot of lame pictures on my phone, but some are actual sentimental pictures that are worth keeping. I don’t have my phone on me at the moment, but I can share some of the images that I keep tucked inside my hard drive.     Nothing amazing, just your standard images.
